name: Featured Image Resize
author: Louy Alakkad

sections.description: This plugin will regenerate all missing image sizes for an image when it’s chosen as a featured image for any post. Very useful when you change your template. No settings whatsoever, just activate and forget.
sections.installation:
1. Download and Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory (or just use wp-admin installer.)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial release.

0.2

  • First production release.

0.3

  • Skipping resize if original image is too small.
